channel.title: Bug
channel.description:
Hey uys, I have a bug in my new quest on my server.
(Hosted for IRL friends only stfu D:)
Anyways, I host it for kids at school too.
Well, a few of them found a bug where in my quest where you can change the Reward (Sorta like a dupe)
Testscape base btw.
Here's what happened.
Player beats kaplhite, black demon, and all dragons.
You talk to mysterious old man and he gives you the reward for slaying the beats.
Here's where it happens, what they do is when they get the reward... The thing pop's up, and they log out and in.
but if they logged out and in like 5 time's it dupe by X5.
Help?

item.title: Bug
item.dc:creator: @chipmunk_man chipmunk man
item.description:
@chipmunk_man wrote:

Yz85Racer:

When they finish the quest, save their character. As it maybe like double saving…

It worked, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Bug
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

When they finish the quest, save their character. As it maybe like double saving…
